content.rendered:
Directed by Gowtam Tinnanuri

Written by Wajid Shaikh. Siddharth Singh. Gowtam Tinnanuri. Gowtam Tinnanuri. Garima Wahal

Star Shahid Kapoor (Arjun Talwar). Mrunal Thakur (Vidya Talwar). Pankaj Kapur (Baali Sir). Prit Kamani (Adult Kittu). Ronit Kamra (Karan ‘Kittu’ Talwar). Geetika Mehandru (Jasleen Shergill). Shishir Sharma (Atul). Rudrashish Majumder (Rudra Juneja). Iftekhar Mahmud (Muu)

Language Hindi

Producers Allu Aravind. Aman Gill. Rupesh Mali. Aneesh Mohan. Dil Raju. Mayank Tiwari. Suryadevara Naga Vamsi

Production Allu Entertainment. Brat Films. Dil Raju Productions
